name: Lemuria: Lost in Space - VR Edition
description: Lemuria: Lost in Space is a unique adventure, full of mysteries, puzzles and shocking discoveries. It's a combination of point 'n click adventure, RPG and survival game.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-3210 or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (AMD Radeon R9 290) or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 6 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
